entry.title: Not a long time ago, in a galaxy not very far away, an astronomer and a computer scientist walk into a bar...
entry.summary:
Description

Python is one of the most popular programming languages in astronomy. In this talk, I will tell a story about how Python helped me to develop a software tool for galaxy modelling, and tackle the scientific and technical challenges that arise in the Big Data era of astronomy.

https://2019.pycon-au.org/talks/not-a-long-time-ago-in-a-galaxy-not-very-far-away-an-astronomer-and-a-computer-scientist-walk-into-a-bar

Fri Aug 2 16:00:00 2019 at Cockle Bay
